channel.title: Need someone to help me coding commands (Z508)

item.title: Need someone to help me coding commands (Z508)
item.dc:creator: @DumBum DumBum
item.description:
@DumBum wrote:

Hey,

Could someone help me with my server?
It’s a Z508 but i don’t know but alot of command that i add/or already have been added doesn’t work.

Example:
There is a command only for admins so

if(cmd[0].equals(“onlyforadmins1”)) {
//p.rights = 2;
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1038, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1040, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1042, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1044, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1046, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1048, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1050, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1053, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1055, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1057, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 6585, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 775, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 1837, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10346, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 10348, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 9765, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 13290, 1);
Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 3840, 1);
p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, “Here you go!”);

}

So it’s only for prights 2 not ?
Wel it doesn’t work , and I got a ::multi that doesn’t work

if (cmd[0].equals(“multi”)) {
p.teleportTo(3244, 3519, p.heightLevel, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1577, 0, 1577, 0);

}

Right not?

And I need a ::giveadmin / ::givemod / ::demote command
Then it would be great

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to help me coding commands (Z508)
